nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison (HC)

Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison is a Star Wars Legends hardcover collection of the five-part comic-book series Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison from author Haden Blackman. It was published by Dark Horse Books on April 23, 2013.

A traitorous uprising against the fledgling Galactic Empire leaves Emperor Palpatine close to death. Saving the Emperor—and the Empire—appears to be a lost cause... unless Vader can uncover the secrets of the Jedi Council and locate the mysterious "Ghost Prison." Collects the five-issue miniseries.
